mapper.select: SELECT ID , CASE WHEN POST_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'post' WHEN BOARD_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'board' WHEN PARENT_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'comment' ELSE 'unknown' END AS TYPE , CONTENT , CREATED_AT AS CREATED_DATE , IS_DELETED AS IS_DELETED , PARENT_ID AS PARENT_ID , LIKE_COUNT FROM COMMENT WHERE ( (#{type} = 'post' AND POST_ID = #{id}) OR (#{type} = 'board' AND BOARD_ID = #{id}) OR (#{type} = 'comment' AND PARENT_ID = #{id}) ) AND IS_DELETED = FALSE ORDER BY CREATED_AT ASC
